Action.author: sergey.minaev
Action.body: ~EvelynEvergreene I can't reproduce the error in my environment. Please share content of your `/etc/apt/sources.list`

Action.author: sergey.minaev
Action.body: ~EvelynEvergreene please not, that "{{\{release channel\}}}" is placeholder and should be replaced by one of the available release channels as it described in readme

Action.author: gudkov
Action.body: I am closing this. ~EvelynEvergreene If you still have problems with this just contact me or Sergey Minaev in slack. We will help you with correct commands.
